verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu tāṅra buke hasta dila
'uṭhaha gopāla' bali' uccaiḥsvare kahila

synonyms: tabe—at that time; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅra buke—on his chest; hasta—hand; dila—placed; uṭhaha gopāla—stand up, Gopāla; bali'—saying; uccaiḥ-svare—very loudly; kahila—said.
translation: Then Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu placed His hand on the chest of Śrī Gopāla and said loudly, "Gopāla, stand up."
